issue.title: Fix issue #758 - Active Record join() bug with condition split in multiple lines

repository.name: CodeIgniter
repository.description: Open Source PHP Framework (originally from EllisLab)

issue.body: Added the removal of break lines that might be in the condition.

issue.title: 3.0 AR escape problems

repository.name: CodeIgniter
repository.description: Open Source PHP Framework (originally from EllisLab)

issue.body:
I've fixed a few AR bugs tonight for you @narbg so its your turn to get this one:

```
A Database Error Occurred
Error Number: 1146

Table 'pyrocms.default_`default_data_field_assignments' doesn't exist

SELECT `default_data_field_assignments`.`id` as `sign_id`, `default_data_streams`.*, `default_data_field_assignments`.*, `default_data_fields`.* FROM `default_data_streams` JOIN `default_``default_data_field_assignments` ON `default_data_streams`.`id`=`default_data_field_assignments`.`stream_id` JOIN `default_``default_data_fields` ON `default_data_fields`.`id`=`default_data_field_assignments`.`field_id` WHERE `default_data_streams`.`id` = '1' ORDER BY `default_data_field_assignments`.`sort_order` asc

Filename: /Users/phil/src/pyrocms/modules/streams_core/models/streams_m.php

Line Number: 563
```

Coming from code like this:

```
    $this->db->where(STREAMS_TABLE.'.id', $stream_id);
    $this->db->join(ASSIGN_TABLE, STREAMS_TABLE.'.id='.ASSIGN_TABLE.'.stream_id');
    $this->db->join(FIELDS_TABLE, FIELDS_TABLE.'.id='.ASSIGN_TABLE.'.field_id');

    $obj = $this->db->get(STREAMS_TABLE);
```

Those constant values are all clear of the prefix:

Debug #1 of 3: 
string 'data_field_assignments' (length=22)

Debug #2 of 3: 
string 'data_streams' (length=12)

Debug #3 of 3: 
string 'data_fields' (length=11)

Fix 3.0 AR please!

issue.title: Return default ip address for command line invokation

repository.name: CodeIgniter
repository.description: Open Source PHP Framework (originally from EllisLab)

issue.body:
I ran into the warning `Undefined index: REMOTE_ADDR in Input.php` when I invoked a controller's method from the command line, e.g. `php index.php mycontroller/myfunction`

My proposed solution simply returns the default localhost ip address `127.0.0.1` when the php process is cli.

issue.title: Updated the MySQLi Driver to Support SSL Connections

repository.name: CodeIgniter
repository.description: Open Source PHP Framework (originally from EllisLab)

issue.body:
Uses the DB_driver class encrypt option as the flag for turning on encryption. Also added SSL connection validation with error logging in order to provide users a way to know if they are actually connecting via SSL. This commit fixes #3781

Signed-off-by: Tim Nolte noltet@sekisui-spi.com

issue.title: Fatal error mongodb with Codeigniter

repository.name: CodeIgniter
repository.description: Open Source PHP Framework (originally from EllisLab)

issue.body:
Please help me in solving this problem
Fatal error: Uncaught Error: Call to undefined method Mongo_db::_show_error() in C:\xampp\htdocs\arcane\application\libraries\mongo_db.php:11 Stack trace: #0 C:\xampp\htdocs\arcane\system\core\Loader.php(1099): Mongo_db->__construct() #1 C:\xampp\htdocs\arcane\system\core\Loader.php(975): CI_Loader->_ci_init_class('mongo_db', '', NULL, NULL) #2 C:\xampp\htdocs\arcane\system\core\Loader.php(216): CI_Loader->_ci_load_class('Mongo_db', NULL, NULL) #3 C:\xampp\htdocs\arcane\application\controllers\templates\home.php(12): CI_Loader->library('mongo_db') #4 C:\xampp\htdocs\arcane\system\core\CodeIgniter.php(308): Home->__construct() #5 C:\xampp\htdocs\arcane\index.php(201): require_once('C:\\xampp\\htdocs...') #6 {main} thrown in C:\xampp\htdocs\arcane\application\libraries\mongo_db.php on line 11

issue.title: Fix passing NULL to setcookie value parameter

repository.name: CodeIgniter
repository.description: Open Source PHP Framework (originally from EllisLab)

issue.body: Fixes Passing null to parameter #2 ($value) of type string is deprecated

issue.title: on CI3_develop see  Session_driver  and php8.1

repository.name: CodeIgniter
repository.description: Open Source PHP Framework (originally from EllisLab)

issue.body:
Hi,
I specify that I have just installed codeIgniter3_develop and php8.1 on an application coded in ci3.1.10.

I have a small error message on the script
system/libraries/Session/Session_driver.php
Severity: 8192

Message: setcookie(): Passing null to parameter #2 ($value) of type string is deprecated

Filename: Session/Session_driver.php

line 156 replace #2 of null to '' type string
		return setcookie(
			$this->_config['cookie_name'],
			'',// correctif
			array(
				'expires' => 1,
				'path' => $this->_config['cookie_path'],
				'domain' => $this->_config['cookie_domain'],
				'secure' => $this->_config['cookie_secure'],
				'httponly' => TRUE,
				'samesite' => $this->_config['cookie_samesite']
			)

I hope this will help!!!
best regard
Gabriel

Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)
